upcoming.title: Building Resilience in Challenging Times
upcoming.speaker: Sarah Johnson
upcoming.speakerBio: Life coach and motivational speaker with 10 years of experience
upcoming.description: Join us for an inspiring session on building resilience and overcoming life's challenges. Sarah will share practical strategies and real-life experiences.

upcoming.title: My Journey from Student to Entrepreneur
upcoming.speaker: Ahmed Ben Ali
upcoming.speakerBio: Founder of TechStart Tunisia, Young Entrepreneur of the Year 2024
upcoming.description: Learn about the challenges and triumphs of starting a business while still in university. A must-attend for aspiring entrepreneurs!

upcoming.title: Mental Health Matters: Breaking the Stigma
upcoming.speaker: Dr. Leila Mansour
upcoming.speakerBio: Clinical psychologist specializing in youth mental health
upcoming.description: An open discussion about mental health, stress management, and building a supportive community.

archive.title: Overcoming Fear of Public Speaking
archive.speaker: Karim Trabelsi
archive.summary: Karim shared powerful techniques for conquering stage fright and becoming a confident speaker. Over 50 attendees participated in interactive exercises.

archive.title: Finding Your Purpose in Life
archive.speaker: Nour Bellamine
archive.summary: A deeply inspiring session where Nour guided participants through self-reflection exercises to discover their life's purpose and passions.

archive.title: Career Transitions: When to Make the Leap
archive.speaker: Ines Khelifi
archive.summary: Ines shared her experience of changing careers three times and provided a framework for making informed career decisions.
